department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Science and Parliamentary Infrastructure Branch (SPIB)  has a requirement for the procurement of Canadian Flags.
duration_in_months: What is the duration of the tender?
full_summary:
**Government of Canada > Tender Opportunities**
=============================================

**Bid Opportunity ID**: WS4107619248

**Title**: Canadian Flags Procurement - National Capital Region

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The Government of Canada's Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a supplier to provide Canadian flags of various sizes. The procurement is open to both Canadian and foreign bidders, with a focus on ensuring the delivery of high-quality flags.

**Bid Requirements**
-------------------

*   The supplier must provide the following types of flags:
    *   260 cm x 460 cm with rope and toggle (Item 1)
    *   135 cm x 270 cm with rope and toggle (Item 2)
    *   180 cm x 360 cm with rope and toggle (Item 3)
    *   90 cm x 180 cm without grommet (Item 4)
    *   90 cm x 180 cm with grommet (Item 5)
*   In addition to the firm quantities, the supplier must be prepared to deliver flags of various sizes (Items P, C, H, S, and G) as requested by the PSPC.
*   The supplier must also be able to provide additional flags (Items 6 to 15) up to a maximum quantity, as specified in the bid document.

**Evaluation Criteria**
---------------------

Bids will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
*   Price ( lowest cost-per-point)

**Important Dates and Times**
-----------------------------

*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 7, 2023 @ 2:00 PM EST
*   **Award Date**: Not specified

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Contact Information**
---------------------

*   **Buyer Contact Name**: Dorion, Camille (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Buyer Contact Email**: [camille.dorion@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:camille.dorion@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Buyer Contact Phone**: Not available
*   **Buyer Contact Fax**: Not available
